div.head: 盤腸生產
div.div: to give birth with a twisted intestine

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: to give birth with a twisted intestine

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with pan chang chan 盤腸產. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry ban xia 半夏 quoting Fu ren da quan liang Gynecological book. Southern Song fang era, 1237. 婦人大全良方 : 盤腸產 , “Delivery with a twisted intestine”, writes: 盤腸生產 , “ To give birth with a twisted intestine ”. Pang guang huo 膀胱火 , bladder fire [5]
Pathological Condition and Etiological Agent. identical with pang guang re 膀胱熱 , bladder heat. Zhen zhu nang 珍珠囊 1: 黃柏 瀉膀胱火 , “ Huang bo drains bladder fire”.
